data.title: V l Modern Compact Crossover SUV l Honda
data.meta_description: Discover the 2025 Honda HR-V - the Modern Compact Crossover SUV, available with Real Time AWD, combining style and utility for weekend adventures.
data.text:
EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic.

STYLING

Sophisticated Profile

The side view of the HR-V highlights a remarkably smooth roofline that’s precisely engineered using “laser brazing,” a joining technique that allows the roof and side panels to merge seamlessly.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic.

STYLING

Front Styling

A honeycomb grille is the centerpiece of this attention-grabbing front end. Gently sloping body lines, angled headlights, and the iconic Honda emblem work together to create a striking first impression wherever you go.

Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.

Sport shown in Milano Red.

STYLING

Sport Styling

The HR-V Sport dials up the attitude with bold 18-inch gloss-black wheels, a unique gloss-black grille, a matte-black bumper, and exclusive badging.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic.

STYLING

Spoiler

A slim spoiler invokes the racing spirit of Honda and adds sporty appeal to its streamlined rear design. And available rear privacy glass keeps items stored in the cargo area out of sight.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic.

STYLING

17-Inch Alloy Wheels

17-inch alloy wheels perfectly complement the eye-catching exterior, creating a dynamic look from every angle.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic.

STYLING

LED Headlights

Slightly angled LED headlights with automatic high beams illuminate your journey and enhance the style of the HR-V.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic.

STYLING

LED Brake Lights

The LED brake lights mimic the headlights’ aesthetic and offer excellent visibility to other drivers.

LX shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with Honda Genuine Accessories.

ACCESSORIES

Honda Genuine Accessories

Whether you’re seeking a simple styling boost or to transform your HR-V into the ultimate Sport Utility Vehicle, Honda Genuine Accessories can take your HR-V to new heights.

LX shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with Honda Genuine Accessories.

ACCESSORIES

Outfitted for Adventure

Outfit your HR-V for endless adventure with a rugged selection of Honda Genuine Accessories that range from protective to practical.

LX shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory roof rack and bike attachment.

ACCESSORIES

Bike Attachment

The frame mount bike attachment lets you transport your bicycle to the best riding locations with ease. It’s lockable for added security, doesn’t require taking apart your bike, and you can even fit two on the accessory roof rack.

LX shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory roof rack and snowboard attachment.

ACCESSORIES

Snowboard Attachment

This handy accessory keeps your snowboards and skis outside to help your interior stay clean and dry. It can transport six pairs of skis or four snowboards, and features oversize buttons for ease of use even while wearing gloves.

LX shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory roof rack and surfboard attachment.

ACCESSORIES

Surfboard Attachment

The surfboard and paddleboard attachment lets you securely transport up to two boards to your destination of choice. It features soft, weather-resistant padding and a telescoping design that allows a custom fit for boards up to 34 inches wide.

HPD™ bronze-finish alloy wheel shown.

ACCESSORIES

Bronze HPD™ Wheels

Head-turning HPD™ bronze-finish alloy wheels give your HR-V a bold, customized appearance that enhances the attitude of the whole vehicle.

STYLING

Sophisticated Profile

The side view of the HR-V highlights a remarkably smooth roofline that’s precisely engineered using “laser brazing,” a joining technique that allows the roof and side panels to merge seamlessly.

STYLING

Front Styling

A honeycomb grille is the centerpiece of this attention-grabbing front end. Gently sloping body lines, angled headlights, and the iconic Honda emblem work together to create a striking first impression wherever you go.

STYLING

Sport Styling

The HR-V Sport dials up the attitude with bold 18-inch gloss-black wheels, a unique gloss-black grille, a matte-black bumper, and exclusive badging.

STYLING

Spoiler

A slim spoiler invokes the racing spirit of Honda and adds sporty appeal to its streamlined rear design. And available rear privacy glass keeps items stored in the cargo area out of sight.

STYLING

17-Inch Alloy Wheels

17-inch alloy wheels perfectly complement the eye-catching exterior, creating a dynamic look from every angle.

STYLING

LED Headlights

Slightly angled LED headlights with automatic high beams illuminate your journey and enhance the style of the HR-V.

STYLING

LED Brake Lights

The LED brake lights mimic the headlights’ aesthetic and offer excellent visibility to other drivers.

ACCESSORIES

Honda Genuine Accessories

Whether you’re seeking a simple styling boost or to transform your HR-V into the ultimate Sport Utility Vehicle, Honda Genuine Accessories can take your HR-V to new heights.

ACCESSORIES

Outfitted for Adventure

Outfit your HR-V for endless adventure with a rugged selection of Honda Genuine Accessories that range from protective to practical.

ACCESSORIES

Bike Attachment

The frame mount bike attachment lets you transport your bicycle to the best riding locations with ease. It’s lockable for added security, doesn’t require taking apart your bike, and you can even fit two on the accessory roof rack.

ACCESSORIES

Snowboard Attachment

This handy accessory keeps your snowboards and skis outside to help your interior stay clean and dry. It can transport six pairs of skis or four snowboards, and features oversize buttons for ease of use even while wearing gloves.

ACCESSORIES

Surfboard Attachment

The surfboard and paddleboard attachment lets you securely transport up to two boards to your destination of choice. It features soft, weather-resistant padding and a telescoping design that allows a custom fit for boards up to 34 inches wide.

ACCESSORIES

Bronze HPD™ Wheels

Head-turning HPD™ bronze-finish alloy wheels give your HR-V a bold, customized appearance that enhances the attitude of the whole vehicle.

EX-L shown with Black Leather.

CABIN

Dashboard

An elegant dashboard accented with honeycomb detailing houses important tech features and serves as the cockpit’s visual anchor.

EX-L shown. One-touch power moonroof standard on EX-L.

CABIN

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Let the light shine in, enjoy a cool breeze, or simply take in more of the scenery, all with one simple tap that opens the one-touch power moonroof.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic. Heated front seats standard on Sport and EX-L. Leather-trimmed seats standard on EX-L.

CABIN

Heated Front Seats

Stay comfortable on even the coldest days with heated and leather-trimmed front seats.

EX-L shown. Dual-zone automatic climate control system standard on EX-L.

CABIN

Dual-Zone Climate Control

The dual-zone automatic climate control system lets you and your front passenger set separate temperatures, so you can both ride in total comfort.

Sport shown.

CABIN

Sport Interior

An all-black interior accented with striking orange stitching and a metallic honeycomb instrument panel insert put the bold personality of the HR-V Sport on full display.

EX-L shown with Black Leather. Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob standard on Sport and EX-L. Leather-trimmed seats standard on EX-L.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Leather-Trimmed Interior

The leather-wrapped steering wheel, shift knob, and leather-trimmed seats make for a luxurious look and feel.

EX-L shown.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Ergonomics

Ergonomic steering-wheel controls let you toggle through screens on the 7-inch digital instrument cluster, adjust audio volume, and manage cruise control settings, all while keeping your hands on the wheel.

EX-L shown with Black Leather.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Body-Stabilizing Seats

Body-stabilizing front seats with uniquely engineered lumbar and side supports help minimize fatigue on long drives, and the available leather-trimmed version of the driver’s seat is power adjustable in eight different ways, so you can easily configure the position that’s perfect for you.

Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.

EX-L shown.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Digital Instrument Cluster

The 7-inch digital instrument cluster lets you choose the information you want in front of you, whether that’s your average MPG, directions, safety settings, or an intelligent driver attention monitor that alerts you when you may be too tired to continue driving.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic. 2023 center console USB ports shown.

VERSATILITY

Seating for Five

The HR-V interior is surprisingly spacious. With comfortable seating for 5, plentiful storage compartments, and electrostatic 2nd-row reading lights that turn on with a simple touch, it’s a cabin everyone can enjoy.

Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.

EX-L shown with Black Leather.

VERSATILITY

Folding 2nd-Row Seats

You can easily configure the interior of the HR-V to suit your needs with its 60/40 split 2nd-row seats. Fold down a single seat to accommodate tall items like a standing lamp, or fold them all down for even more cargo space.

Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.

EX-L shown with Black Leather.

VERSATILITY

Cargo

Even with the 2nd-row seats up, the HR-V provides 24.4 cubic feet of cargo space, enough to transport large suitcases, house plants, or plenty of groceries. Folding down the 2nd row seats creates enough space for a set of golf clubs or the perfect piece of antique furniture.

Sport shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory all-season floor mats.

ACCESSORIES

All-Season Floor Mats

Shield the original carpets of your HR-V from the wear and tear of everyday driving with all-season floor mats. These durable, easy-to-clean floor mats feature extended sidewalls for extra protection and are specially designed to trap dirt.

Sport shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory door sill protection film and all-season floor mats.

ACCESSORIES

Door Sill Protection Film

Door sill protection film helps guard the lower door sill against scuffing and features silver detailing for a subtle touch of style.

Sport shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory cargo cover and cargo tray.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Cover

Keep belongings stored in the cargo area out of view and help protect them from damaging UV rays with the cargo cover.

Sport shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory cargo tray.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Tray

The cargo tray helps keep the rear of your HR-V in pristine condition. Durable, with raised sides for added protection, and perfectly molded to fit your HR-V, it protects the floor in the rear storage area from dirt and spills.

Sport shown in Nordic Forest Pearl* with accessory cargo tray and seatback protectors.

ACCESSORIES

Seatback Protectors

Whether your rear seats are up or folded down, you can feel confident knowing the seatbacks will be protected from scuffs and dirt by seatback protectors.

CABIN

Dashboard

An elegant dashboard accented with honeycomb detailing houses important tech features and serves as the cockpit’s visual anchor.

CABIN

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Let the light shine in, enjoy a cool breeze, or simply take in more of the scenery, all with one simple tap that opens the one-touch power moonroof.

CABIN

Heated Front Seats

Stay comfortable on even the coldest days with heated and leather-trimmed front seats.

CABIN

Dual-Zone Climate Control

The dual-zone automatic climate control system lets you and your front passenger set separate temperatures, so you can both ride in total comfort.

CABIN

Sport Interior

An all-black interior accented with striking orange stitching and a metallic honeycomb instrument panel insert put the bold personality of the HR-V Sport on full display.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Leather-Trimmed Interior

The leather-wrapped steering wheel, shift knob, and leather-trimmed seats make for a luxurious look and feel.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Ergonomics

Ergonomic steering-wheel controls let you toggle through screens on the 7-inch digital instrument cluster, adjust audio volume, and manage cruise control settings, all while keeping your hands on the wheel.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Body-Stabilizing Seats

Body-stabilizing front seats with uniquely engineered lumbar and side supports help minimize fatigue on long drives, and the available leather-trimmed version of the driver’s seat is power adjustable in eight different ways, so you can easily configure the position that’s perfect for you.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Digital Instrument Cluster

The 7-inch digital instrument cluster lets you choose the information you want in front of you, whether that’s your average MPG, directions, safety settings, or an intelligent driver attention monitor that alerts you when you may be too tired to continue driving.

VERSATILITY

Seating for Five

The HR-V interior is surprisingly spacious. With comfortable seating for 5, plentiful storage compartments, and electrostatic 2nd-row reading lights that turn on with a simple touch, it’s a cabin everyone can enjoy.

VERSATILITY

Folding 2nd-Row Seats

You can easily configure the interior of the HR-V to suit your needs with its 60/40 split 2nd-row seats. Fold down a single seat to accommodate tall items like a standing lamp, or fold them all down for even more cargo space.

VERSATILITY

Cargo

Even with the 2nd-row seats up, the HR-V provides 24.4 cubic feet of cargo space, enough to transport large suitcases, house plants, or plenty of groceries. Folding down the 2nd row seats creates enough space for a set of golf clubs or the perfect piece of antique furniture.

ACCESSORIES

All-Season Floor Mats

Shield the original carpets of your HR-V from the wear and tear of everyday driving with all-season floor mats. These durable, easy-to-clean floor mats feature extended sidewalls for extra protection and are specially designed to trap dirt.

ACCESSORIES

Door Sill Protection Film

Door sill protection film helps guard the lower door sill against scuffing and features silver detailing for a subtle touch of style.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Cover

Keep belongings stored in the cargo area out of view and help protect them from damaging UV rays with the cargo cover.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Tray

The cargo tray helps keep the rear of your HR-V in pristine condition. Durable, with raised sides for added protection, and perfectly molded to fit your HR-V, it protects the floor in the rear storage area from dirt and spills.

ACCESSORIES

Seatback Protectors

Whether your rear seats are up or folded down, you can feel confident knowing the seatbacks will be protected from scuffs and dirt by seatback protectors.

Sport with available AWD and Honda Genuine Accessories shown* in Urban Gray Pearl.*

ENGINEERING

Real Time AWD™

The available Real Time AWD™ with Intelligent Control System™ gives you the power to effortlessly tackle inclement weather and rough terrain. Using an array of sensors, it precisely calculates when to send torque to the rear wheels.

EX-L with available AWD shown in Nordic Forest Pearl.*

ENGINEERING

Snow Mode

Snow mode helps keep you in control when covering snowy ground. It helps minimize wheel slippage by setting the automatic transmission to start in second gear and reducing pedal sensitivity, and offers more peace of mind than ever, thanks to improved acceleration and hill climbing.

EX-L shown in Crystal Black Pearl.

ENGINEERING

Hill Descent Control

Navigating down a steep grade is easier with hill descent control, which keeps you from gaining unwanted speed on downhill crawls so you can focus on the road ahead instead of the brake pedal.

ENGINEERING

Suspension

The MacPherson strut front suspension and multi-link rear suspension make the HR-V exceptionally fun to drive, nimble enough to weave through city traffic, and remarkably smooth, making long trips even more comfortable.

ENGINEERING

158-hp, 2.0-Liter Engine

The HR-V brings excitement to every drive, thanks to its 2.0-liter engine’s 158 horsepower* and responsive acceleration.

EX-L shown. Wireless Apple CarPlay® compatibility standard on EX-L.

AUDIO & CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Apple CarPlay® Compatibility

Use your iPhone®* with wireless Apple CarPlay® compatibility to access your favorite map, audio, and messaging apps through the available 9-inch Color touch-screen, all without a cable.*

EX-L shown. Wireless Android Auto™ compatibility standard on EX-L.

AUDIO & CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Android Auto™ Compatibility

Use your compatible Android™ phone with wireless Android Auto™ compatibility to access directions, text messages, and your music library through the available 9-inch Color touch-screen—no cable necessary.*

EX-L shown. 9-inch Color touch-screen standard on EX-L.

AUDIO & CONNECTIVITY

9-Inch Touch-Screen

The high-definition, 9-inch Color touch-screen is your user-friendly hub for connecting to audio sources, taking calls, and more. It places frequently used apps on the main screen for ease of access and features a volume knob for quickly adjusting audio levels on the move.

EX-L shown. Wireless phone charger standard on EX-L.

AUDIO & CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Phone Charger

No more cords. No more adapters. The wireless phone charger provides a hassle-free charging zone that’s easy to use with compatible phones.*

AUDIO & CONNECTIVITY

HondaLink®

The HondaLink®* app makes it easy to check your vehicle’s mileage, fuel range, and oil life remotely, and even schedule service appointments. See details here.

EX-L shown in Modern Steel Metallic. 8-speaker audio system standard on EX-L.

AUDIO & CONNECTIVITY

8-Speaker Audio System

The 8-speaker, 180-watt audio system pumps out your favorite music and podcasts in high-quality sound.

Sport shown in Urban Gray Pearl.* Blind spot information system only standard on Sport and EX-L.

PEACE OF MIND

Blind Spot Information System

The blind spot information system can detect and alert you to the presence of other vehicles to the side of your HR-V, and with cross traffic monitor, it can alert you to approaching vehicles detected when you’re backing up.*

EX-L shown.

PEACE OF MIND

Multi-Angle Rearview Camera

Choose from three different angles—normal, top-down, and wide—for a better view of what’s behind you whenever you shift into Reverse.*

EX-L shown in Milano Red. Smart Entry with Walk Away Auto Lock® standard on Sport and EX-L.

PEACE OF MIND

Walk Away Auto Lock®

After you park and shut the doors, just walk eight feet away from the HR-V with the key fob to lock up automatically, thanks to Smart Entry with Walk Away Auto Lock®.* When you come back, you can unlock just by grabbing one of the front-door handles.

EX-L shown in Milano Red. Parking sensors standard on EX-L.

PEACE OF MIND

Parking Sensors

Front and rear parking sensors can alert you when you’re getting too close to a detected object, making it easier to parallel park.

EX-L shown in Nordic Forest Pearl.*

PEACE OF MIND

Smart Wipers

Enjoy a clear view in rain or shine thanks to fluid-conserving smart wipers, which dispense windshield washer fluid through the wiper arms instead of in a wide spray.

EX-L shown in Nordic Forest Pearl.*

PEACE OF MIND

Heated Side Mirrors

Heated, power-adjustable side mirrors help clear your view by keeping frost at bay on cold days.

PEACE OF MIND

ACE™ Body Structure

The Advanced Compatibility Engineering™ (ACE™) body structure is a Honda-exclusive body design that enhances occupant protection and crash compatibility in frontal collisions.

ENGINEERING

Real Time AWD™

The available Real Time AWD™ with Intelligent Control System™ gives you the power to effortlessly tackle inclement weather and rough terrain. Using an array of sensors, it precisely calculates when to send torque to the rear wheels.

ENGINEERING

Snow Mode

Snow mode helps keep you in control when covering snowy ground. It helps minimize wheel slippage by setting the automatic transmission to start in second gear and reducing pedal sensitivity, and offers more peace of mind than ever, thanks to improved acceleration and hill climbing.

ENGINEERING

Hill Descent Control

Navigating down a steep grade is easier with hill descent control, which keeps you from gaining unwanted speed on downhill crawls so you can focus on the road ahead instead of the brake pedal.

ENGINEERING

Suspension

The MacPherson strut front suspension and multi-link rear suspension make the HR-V exceptionally fun to drive, nimble enough to weave through city traffic, and remarkably smooth, making long trips even more comfortable.

ENGINEERING

158-hp, 2.0-Liter Engine

The HR-V brings excitement to every drive, thanks to its 2.0-liter engine’s 158 horsepower* and responsive acceleration.
